ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE MARCO R. CLOUTIER, Chief Judge of the Provincial Court of New Brunswick, to be a Judge of the Court of King's Bench of New Brunswick, Trial Division, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal of New Brunswick.

precis: Appointment of the HONOURABLE MARCO R. CLOUTIER, Chief Judge of the Provincial Court of New Brunswick, to be a Judge of the Court of King's Bench of New Brunswick, Trial Division, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal of New Brunswick.
